00025   enum EBmlEventSupIntValues {kBmlEventSupFifo,
00026                               kBmlEventSupEventIDTrailer, 
00027                               kBmlEventSupBunchID, 
00028                               kBmlEventSupTDCErrors,  
00029                               kBmlEventSupBufferOverflow, 
00030                               kBmlEventSupTriggerLost, 
00031                               kBmlEventSupTDCWordCountTrailer,
00032                               //kBmlEventSupStatus,
00033                               //kBmlEventSupEventSupDataCounter,
00034                               //kBmlEventSupNumberOfSignalChannels,
00035                               //We store the name of the tdc in the class (see also DaqTypeDataBlock).
00036                               //Therefore we need to memorise the length of the name and where in the
00037                               //heap the characters do start 
00038                               //Like this we can always extend the object
00039                               kBmlEventNamesPointer, kBmlEventNamesLength, 
00040                               kBmlEventSupIntValues};

00094   BmlEventDataSup &setTDCType(std::string typeStr) {
00095     //stringstream mystream(typeStr);
00096     //int myint; 
00097     //mystream >> myint;
00104     setPointerToIndexOfIntTypeNames(kBmlEventSupIntValues);
00105     setLengthIndexOfIntTypeNames(kBmlEventSupIntValues+1);
00106     int namepointer(kBmlEventSupIntValues+2);
00107     setTypeIndex(getPointerToIndexOfIntTypeNames(), namepointer);
00108     //std::cout << "String length: " << typeStr.size() << std::endl;
00109     convertStringToInts(obj(),typeStr, namepointer, getLengthIndexOfIntTypeNames() );
00110     _obj=obj();
00111     return *this;
00112   }
00113  
00114   void setPointerToIndexOfIntTypeNames(int nameind) { 
00115      obj()->setIntVal(kBmlEventNamesPointer, nameind);
00116   }
00117 
00118 
00119   void setLengthIndexOfIntTypeNames(int lengthindex) {
00120       obj()->setIntVal(kBmlEventNamesLength, lengthindex);
00121       }
00122

00125     int getLengthIndexOfIntTypeNames() const {
00126       return getIntVal(kBmlEventNamesLength);
00127       };  
00128 
00129 
00130 
00132     int getPointerToIndexOfIntTypeNames() const {
00133       return getIntVal(kBmlEventNamesPointer);
00134       };  
00135 
00136 
00138     void setTypeIndex(int pos, int value) {
00139       obj()->setIntVal(pos, value);
00140     } 
00141 
00144   std::string getTDCType() const {
00145      return getStringFromInts(_obj, _obj->getIntVal(getPointerToIndexOfIntTypeNames()), getLengthIndexOfIntTypeNames() );
00146   }

00150    obj()->setIntVal(kBmlEventSupFifo, fifocont);
00151    return *this;

00155   unsigned short getEventCount() const {
00156     //std::cout << "Retrieved Fifocont: " << std::hex << getIntVal(kBmlEventSupFifo) << std::dec << std::endl;
00157     return (( getIntVal(kBmlEventSupFifo) >> 16) & 0xffff);
00158   }
